website_summaries.verdict: Sennheiser's GSP 670 wireless gaming headset feels comfortable, sounds terrific, and features Bluetooth so you can use it with your phone.

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones, issues required me to return them
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same pair of Sennheiser headphones for 14 years so I'm a pretty big fan of the brand. These were good, but I've sent them back for a refund as the wireless range is very poor. You'll maybe get 4 metres before they start cutting out, and Logitech 2.4Ghz dongles for mice/keyboards cause interference on the connection. You also cannot toggle between the wireless and bluetooth connections on the headset, which is a peculiar failure of product design. Quite comfy and well made, however.
customer_reviews.author: R. May

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality, when it works, is great. However every now and then (every 20-30 seconds, to every few minutes) there are interruptions and static crackles. I've moved the dongle from the back of my computer (wooden desk) to front, with 60 cm distance from the headset and from interruptions on every 5-10 seconds, now I get crackle every 30 seconds-2 minutes. As for the claims that it's "studio microphone quality", that is just blatantly false, microphone sounds like on any other gaming headset I have ever tried. If this was a 50-100 pounds headset, It would get 4-5 stars, but at 260 GBP, such issues and bad quality is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vukovic

customer_reviews.title: Great but not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing headphones, i was expecting a bit more for the money though. I have problems with the connectivity sometimes, the dongle seems to need clear line of sight and tethering internet from your phone interferes with the signal. Pros: 1. Sound amazing 2. They charge really fast 3. Very comfortable after you wear them in for a bit. Cons: 1. Almost no range 2. Not as loud as i would like. 3. Base is balanced but lacking real punch.
customer_reviews.author: James Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect wireless headset.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing and exactly what I wanted from a wireless headset. Top tip: don’t plug the dongle into a USB 3 port. Use USB 2. The power delivery on 3 interferes with the signal and reduces range dramatically. This is not isolated to this device but a lot of dongle’s suffer from this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. R. Pennells

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound
customer_reviews.text: Like the big volume control easy to adjust by touch. Very solid build (my last logitech headphone mic snapped off) Smart switch toggles stereo to 7.1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont but these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after being under the impression that Sennheiser was a top producer of headphones. Poor fitting to the point that they are painful to wear. Adjustment of head set makes no difference at all. Moving more than two metres away and the signal starts to drop out. The sound cancellation has stopped working and am trying to return, So far I've waited two and a half weeks for a call back!! Absolutely dont buy these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset, No Staff?
customer_reviews.text: Bought the headset in September 2019 loved them, then the charger port gave out, contacted Sennheiser and only had automated responses, it's been over a month and a half now since they broke, still no contact and they're still well within warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: What a great sound, can’t rate highly enough. So impressed
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Great for power users
customer_reviews.text: I used these for taking calls at work as well as for gaming and some casual listening. They are exceptionally comfortable for long periods, good build quality and great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Please avoid, more stress than they are worth
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing, the mic is clear technically really good. The supporting software is really poor, every month or so my headset stops working and I need to contact EPOS support to fix the issue every time, as the troubleshooting is useless.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I've not seemingly encountered many of the issues seemingly in the reviews with these headphones. Could be an issue of quality control though, so beware! The headphones sound great and they look the part too. No matter whether you're gaming or watching or listening, these just sound great. You can switch between EQ profiles with the press of a button but I tend to leave this as is, though you can save your own presets. The Bluetooth range and connection remains throughout and suits walking to the kitchen without loss of signal. As I say, I've not had the issues others seem to have encountered, so recommend these. The battery is good too!
customer_reviews.author: Ev

product_meta.title: Sennheiser GSP 670 Wireless Gaming Headset, Lag-FREE Bluetooth, 7.1 Surround Sound, Noise-Cancelling Mic, Audio & Volume Control, for Windows PC, PS4 - Black
product_meta.description: Get the freedom to move with the Sennheiser GSP 670 headset featuring state-of-the-art low latency technology and seamless Bluetooth connection. With Sennheiser Gaming suite downloaded, you can turn on 7.1 surround sound and customize audio pre-sets so that you can start playing sooner and be fully immersed. A noise-cancelling mic reduces background noise and breathing for excellent communication through your devices. Feel the difference in your gaming experience with soft and stylish suede-like ear pads and an adjustable headband crafted to bring you comfort For long gaming sessions.Note: The GSP 670 software is currently only compatible with Windows 10 PC software.
feature_bullets: Low-latency – The GSP 670 wireless gaming headphones deliver lossless Bluetooth connection and state-of-the-art low Latency technology to create a virtually Seamless sound experience
Custom audio presets– turn on 7.1 surround sound and customize setting presets through the Sennheiser Gaming suite for ultimate gaming Immersion
Flip-to-mute mic – A broadcast-quality, noise-cancelling microphone cuts out breathing and background noise with an additional flip-to-mute feature
Far Bluetooth range – Move freely With a 32.8 feet (10m) range of uninterrupted Bluetooth connection
Long-lasting power – play longer with up to 20 hours of Bluetooth usage on one charge and fast 7-minute charging that powers 2 hours of wireless gameplay

Comfortable wear – Soft, noise-isolating leatherette ear pads and adjustable headband sliders with a double-axis metal hinge system reduce pressure and provide optimal comfort for long gaming sessions
Wireless compatibility – Compatible with Windows 10 Pcs, PlayStation 4, and mobile phones

What's in the box – the GSP 670 headset, GSA 70 USB dongle, and one USB cable. Note: A suggestion for connection problems could be to plug the headset dongle into a front-facing USB port. Please make sure you have the latest version of the software installed
